page.title: 20THE SCHOOL FETE
page.content: This year at school we had a summer fete.For a few weeks we collected all sorts of diffrent things,toys,sweets, bottles,tins,jumble,books,games and cakes.We decided to hold it on Tuesday July 2nd. at 6.30 p.m.,so that as many people as possible could come. We practiced our recorders and decided to play some of our favourite pieces which were Eye Level, Magic roundabout, Go and Tell Aunt Nancy, Humming top and Kumbaya It was a lovely evening and lots of people came .We had a tombola stall,books and toys,cakes,bric-a-brac nearly new stall, Guess the number of sweets in a jar, Guess the name of the doll,hot dogs, ice cream,refreshments and the welly throwing championship. The raffle was drawn at 8.00 o' clock and every one went home after a really enjoyable evening.
